attributes.action: remove congestion in towns by enforcing parking laws.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In many towns in the UK, congestion charges are not needed because the government already has the laws available to enforce the traffic laws. For example, just one car parked in an illegal manner in the town centre can make traffic grind to a halt.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
